word_group.brief_definition: 借款给其他银行的最低利率；贴现率
折扣因子；贴现因子；折扣系数
现金折扣；现金优惠；有现金折扣
没有折扣；无折扣；不打折
折扣价格；折扣价；优惠价格

团体折扣；团体优惠价格；团购价

bilingual.target: 我们有一个10%的折扣优惠券。

bilingual.source: The price has already minus the discount.
bilingual.target: 这个价格已经减去了折扣。

bilingual.source: The kino has a special discount on Tuesdays.
bilingual.target: 电影院周二有特别折扣。

bilingual.source: The seller offered a discount on the product.
bilingual.target: 卖家提供了产品的折扣。

bilingual.source: If you prepay, you can enjoy a discount.
bilingual.target: 如果你预付，可以享受折扣。

bilingual.source: The bookshop offers a discount to students.
bilingual.target: 这家书店给学生提供折扣。

bilingual.source: The vendor offered a discount on his ware.
bilingual.target: 小贩对他的商品提供了折扣。

bilingual.source: The store is having a big discount sale.
bilingual.target: 这家商店正在进行大折扣促销。

bilingual.source: The salesman gave us a great discount.
bilingual.target: 推销员给了我们一个很好的折扣。

list.abstract: discount（[ˈdɪskaʊnt , dɪsˈkaʊnt]），英语单词，作名词用，为折扣；贴现率。作动词用，为打折扣；对…不予考虑；贴现。短语搭配有give a discount（打折），例句为“It's sold at a discount price.（它是打折出售的）”。 discount名词类近义词有agio、rabato，及物动词类近义词有water sth. down、preach down。

yingyinNormal.en: When it doesn't get the negative signal from the discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而不会受到价格折扣的影响。

yingyinNormal.en: If the government wants to get into the business of giving discount drugs to the all the population.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果政府计划把折扣药品把折扣药品发放给所有人群。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want to discount the registration or do you want to make it free?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会给他折扣还是免费？

yingyinNormal.en: You want to discount the taxes people pay on the cars, or you want to make it free?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会提供车税折扣还是免费？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. What kind of discount do we get? Twenty percent. I love this job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们买东西会有多少折扣？八折，我爱死这份工作了。

yingyinNormal.en: I found a tattoo shop nearby. It has four stars on Yelp, and it has military discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我找到附近的一家纹身店，大众点评上四颗星，军人还享有折扣。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on. Can you do any better? Are you kidding? I'm already giving you the friends and family discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，还能少点吗？开什么玩笑，这已经是亲友折扣了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, did you hear that? We're getting the friends and family discount. We are honored and we will take it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听到了吗？人家都给我们亲友折扣了，我们很荣幸，这就买了。

yingyinNormal.en: But discount to zero is particularly influential, it's particularly be, because zero is a different price.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是折扣到零影响力更大，真是的是这样，但是0是个不一般的价格。

yingyinNormal.en: Giving somebody discount even if they know it's not on expiration date and there is nothing in it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当人们接受折扣药物时，即使他们知道这药没有过期，也没有加什么不好的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, listen you guys. I have this friend at Bloomingdales who's quitting tomorrow and he wants to abuse his discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有朋友在布鲁明戴尔百货上班，明天就不干了，他想要花掉他的折扣券。

yingyinNormal.en: So join me. Help get the formula back, and I'll give each and every one of you a free Krabby Patty. No. Wait. Even better, a slight discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 任何人只要加入我，并帮我夺回秘方，就能免费获得一个蟹黄堡！不对！等等！更好的方案，小折扣！
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: You know, the nice thing about Shel Mart is I own it, so I get a 15% discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好处就是谢尔玛是我开的，所以我买东西85折。

yingyinNormal.en: What about me? I'm sorry, Leonard. It's too early to discount the possibility of this being an inside job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我呢？对不起，莱纳德，现在就排除内鬼作案的可能性还为时过早。

yingyinNormal.en: We can make it really uncomfortable for you at the gym, and people are already talking about your discount yoga pants. So yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能让你在健身房的日子很不好过，人们已经开始议论你的打折瑜伽裤了，所以，你懂的。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, the rest of the group acts, thank you so much. Oh, don't feel bad, folks. There will be a ten percent discount on tickets for everyone. Yeah, sure, thanks a lot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，剩下的诸位，谢谢你们的参与，请不要难过选手们，你们每位都可以享受现场决赛9折的门票。谢谢，我心领了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I can't afford this either. No. I'm just to figure out which one I want, then I'm gonna get it at Kleinman's, this discount place in Brooklyn, day after tomorrow they are having a huge sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是来这里找婚纱，然后我会到克莱门婚纱店买，他们在大减价。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Becoming too widely available at a cheaper price through <highlight>discount</highlight> stores discourages full-price sales.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过折扣店以更便宜的价格广泛销售会阻碍全价销售。

examination_example.sentence: Selling products at a <highlight>discount</highlight> will do greater harm to luxury brands than destroying them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打折销售产品对奢侈品牌的伤害会比毁掉它更大。

examination_example.sentence: Adidas Brazil even offers a <highlight>discount</highlight> each time a customer brings in an old pair of shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿迪达斯巴西店甚至还会每次为带来一双旧鞋的顾客提供折扣。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And I heard that the new supermarket offers some big <highlight>discounts</highlight> to attract customers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听说新开的超市为吸引顾客大打折扣。
她可以用现金享受折扣。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Club members will get a <highlight>discount</highlight> (折扣) of 10% for hardback books and 20% for paperback books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 俱乐部成员购买精装书可享受10%的折扣，购买平装书可享受20%的折扣。

examination_example.sentence: They are given <highlight>discounts</highlight> (打折) in stores and restaurants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商店和餐馆给他们打折。

examination_example.sentence: If you smile, it will give you a special <highlight>discount</highlight> for your goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你微笑，它会给你的商品一个特别的折扣。
